name: Flowly
headline: Our mobile app reduces chronic pain for 100 million Americans.
description:
Flowly’s mobile app is the VR version of Calm with a focus on reducing chronic pain for 100 million Americans. Flowly subscribers receive a $5 VR headset and Heart Rate sensor that collects a user's biometric data like HR and HRV, and converts it to visualizations in virtual experiences that reduce pain by 46%. 
Flowly is backed by the National Institutes of Health.

founders.name: Celine Tien, Founder
founders.description: Founder and CEO of Flowly. Principal Investigator on two phased clinical trials at UPMC and USC, backed by the NIH. Director and writer of Pippa’s Pan 盼, one of the world’s first immersive Virtual Reality hybrid live-action films (selected for 2017 Festival de Cannes VR, placed top three at  VR/AR challenges at CES). Previously, in feature development at DreamWorks Animation. Grew up as a film/TV actor.  Also the founder of the non-profit education-based organization: Zoom for Kids!

founders.name: Narae Kim, Founder
founders.description: Narae is a Co-Founder and CCO of Flowly, a clinically proven platform for managing pain and its comorbidities: anxiety, depression, and disordered sleep. In addition to her role at Flowly, Narae is a multi-award-winning art and creative director across VR, film, theater, and entertainment. Her drive to blend art, technology, and mental well-being is evident in her original works, showcased at esteemed events like the Cannes Film Festival, Cork International Film Festival, CES, Siggraph and more.

founders.name: Julien Soros, Founder
founders.description: Julien is Cofounder & CTO at Flowly. He has a background in Electrical Engineering from Yale University where he focused on Systems & Controls as well as Digital Signal Processing. Previously, Julien worked at Hyperloop One on their Transponics team doing control algorithm design and monte carlo system stability analysis. Julien's interest in Engineering began with guitar building, honing his skills at Veillette Guitars.

# **Live Pain-Free,Live Fully**
Flowly is a virtual clinic delivering the latest in pain science for people in pain who have struggled to find relief.Work one-on-one with your licensed _human_ therapist in our evidence-based 12-week program and gain the tools to reclaim your life.
[Schedule a free consultation![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/63d31ffde6af3165f793d5fb_cta-arrow-white.svg)](https://www.flowly.world/</healthplan>)[Schedule a free consultation](https://www.flowly.world/</healthplan>)
## Covered By Insurance
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/66bbf11c18eacad738cbceab_aetna.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/66bbf11cb32a7ef9c0abfb7d_medicare.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/66bbf11cde51a891eb0ed029_optum.png)
[Check your coverage![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/63d31ffde6af3165f793d5fb_cta-arrow-white.svg)](https://www.flowly.world/</healthplan>)
# Science-backed, personalized approach to pain management
 _Flowly’s program brings you the latest breakthroughs in pain recovery science, addressing the physical and mental challenges of persistent nonstructural pain._
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/6709a5fede3f83e84e322fb7_LandingIcon-88-min.png)
### **88% of people with chronic pain can experience benefit from Flowly’s Healing from Pain program**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/6709a62575afc130dc26e62f_LandingIcon-55-min.png)
### **55% reported improved sleep**
### Flowly is recommended by Physicians
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/63d31ffde6af31fecb93d58f_Star-rating-yellow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/63d31ffde6af31fecb93d58f_Star-rating-yellow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/63d31ffde6af31fecb93d58f_Star-rating-yellow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/63d31ffde6af31fecb93d58f_Star-rating-yellow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/63d31ffde6af31fecb93d58f_Star-rating-yellow.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/65e0e5407413ac6586029af4_icons8-quote-96.png)
I highly recommend Flowly’s [Healing from Pain] program as it provides an easy to follow and fun yet relaxing way to learn valuable information about how to become your own hero as you develop your hero’s journey out of chronic pain and into the life you want to celebrate."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/64b835e6145d09a0175e751b_Heather%40200.png)
**Dr. Heather Martarella**
Dr. Heather Martarella has been providing education, treatment and hope for those experiencing chronic pain since 2004.
[Read more about the science![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/63d31ffde6af3165f793d5fb_cta-arrow-white.svg)](https://www.flowly.world/<https:/www.flowly.world/Science>)
# [Up to 88% of chronic pain is nonstructural](https://www.flowly.world/<https:/pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/37777033/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/66e9d871bb8bf7796beaf131_Pain1.png)
Pain that starts without an injury or starts several days after an injury, and persists even after the injury has healed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/66e9d870908511e4fccbea07_Pain2.png)
Pain that starts during times of stress.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/66e9d8703ad40214509a7460_Pain3.png)
Pain that’s inconsistent, such as back pain while standing but not while running.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/66e9d8712dcc3c44c4e45e41_Pain4.png)
Pain that moves around the body, or becomes symmetrical.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/66e9d871be85dfbfe3802572_Pain5.png)
Multiple pain spots that are difficult to explain.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/66e9d871a6fc4c569a0c928b_Pain6.png)
Symptoms that follow an erratic or unpredictable pattern, changing daily or weekly in severity.
# Nonstructural pain can encompass other forms of pain you may be familiar with, such as
Neuroplastic Pain
Primary Pain
Nonspecific Pain
Low-back Pain
Fibromyalgia
Tension Headaches
Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
Irritable Bowel Syndrome
and more.
# Schedule a call to see if you have nonstructural pain
[Check your coverage![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/63d31ffde6af3165f793d5fb_cta-arrow-white.svg)](https://www.flowly.world/</healthplan>)
# How Flowly's Healing from Pain Program Works
# **Cutting-Edge Pain Management Techniques**
Flowly’s program leverages the latest advancements in chronic pain research to deliver innovative psychological approaches for treating nonstructural pain. Our licensed therapists use a blend of proven methods, personalized to meet your unique needs and goals.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/66ff2cf2e981bea94e8b9527_WhatisFlowly1-2.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/66e9da30dc8dfe653ef7f9da_zoom6.jpg)
# **One-on-One Personalized Sessions with your dedicated licensed Therapist**
Begin with an assessment to identify nonstructural pain, followed by a tailored program that educates you on the neuroscience of pain, retrains your brain to reduce pain signals, and builds emotional resilience. Each phase of your pain therapy is conducted by your therapist to help you re-engage with life and restore meaningful connections.
# **On-Demand Tools to Enhance your Healing Journey**
Anytime and anyplace, practice what you've learned with your therapist via the Flowly app. With a curriculum of daily lessons and a library of relaxation training exercises, the Flowly app - and [our suite of wellness tools](https://www.flowly.world/</vr>) - will supercharge your work with your therapist.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/66e9da30690f7edfdb6ff88f_kit9.jpg)
[Book a Free Consultation Call![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/63d31ffde6af3165f793d5fb_cta-arrow-white.svg)](https://www.flowly.world/</healthplan>)
# Loved by Patients, Recommended by Providers
After completing the Healing from Pain program, the changes are incredible. I don't wake up worried about pain anymore.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/65137462e79ed9e9eac0923c_aw-hero-bg-5.webp)
Alyssa
Flowly empowered me and my mother how to manage our pain. We are no longer on pain medication.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/65137462e79ed9e9eac09237_aw-hero-bg-3.webp)
Dr. Jennifer Jones
Flowly usually get my pain down to about between 0-2, which is exactly where my opioid medications get me also.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/65137462e79ed9e9eac0921e_aw-hero-bg-7.webp)
Gabriella
I have back problems and hard time sleeping. [With Flowly] I get to see how my heart rate changes as I learned to breathe better, and I’ve really seen a difference in my body and how I feel.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/65137462e79ed9e9eac0923c_aw-hero-bg-5.webp)
ib****
It is 100% worth it. It has that kind of power to really impact your life, to reduce your pain and so much more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/65137462e79ed9e9eac09232_aw-hero-bg-2.webp)
Maggie
I have generalized anxiety and C-PTSD. Flowly can take my pain down several levels. My breathing is better when doing my rehabilitative workouts.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d31ffce6af31d9af93d55a/65137462e79ed9e9eac0921e_aw-hero-bg-7.webp)
ga*****

generated_description:
**Flowly: Revolutionizing Pain Management**

Founded in 2019 and emerging from Y Combinator's Batch S21, Flowly is on a mission to help 100 million Americans reduce chronic pain through its innovative mobile app. Think of Flowly as the virtual reality counterpart to Calm, but with a specific focus on alleviating chronic pain.

### How It Works
Flowly's platform combines cutting-edge VR technology with biofeedback tools, including a heart rate sensor that provides real-time data about the user's physiological state. Subscribers not only get access to the app but also a $5 VR headset to enhance their experience. This technology allows Flowly to tailor immersive experiences that have been shown to reduce pain by 46%. 

The company's **Healing from Pain program** operates over a structured 12-week period, pairing users with licensed therapists who help them navigate the complexities of chronic pain. With an impressive statistic that 88% of participants report benefits from the program, and 55% noting improved sleep, the method is scientifically backed and recommended by healthcare providers.

### Insurance and Accessibility
One of the standout features of Flowly is that many programs are covered by insurance providers such as Aetna and Medicare, making it accessible to a broader audience. So, if you're tired of being sidelined by pain, this might just be the solution you've been looking for.

### Team and Support
Operating out of Los Angeles, California, Flowly operates with a compact team of three, supported by a group partner, Nan. Despite the size, the impact is profound, bridging the gap between technology and healthcare in a meaningful way.

### Why Flowly?
Flowly understands that pain isn’t just physical; it’s emotional, affecting one’s quality of life. By addressing both the physical and psychological aspects of pain, they’re not just selling an app but offering a comprehensive toolkit. Think of it as therapy combined with personal coaching, all available from the comfort of your home.

If you’ve felt trapped by chronic pain, take a moment to check out their program. Flowly isn't just about pain management; it’s about reclaiming your life.

For more information, visit [Flowly's official site](https://www.flowly.world/) and consider scheduling a free consultation to see if this could be the right fit for you in your journey toward a pain-free life.
